sentences.en: A telegram from Uncle Fred arrived.
sentences.cn: 弗雷德舅舅发的一封电报来了。

sentences.en: After his parents cashed in, he lived with his uncle.
sentences.cn: 他在父母去世后，与叔叔在一起过。

sentences.en: Auntie and Uncle suggested she serve in the shop.
sentences.cn: 阿姨和叔叔建议她去商店工作。

sentences.en: Auntie Hilda and Uncle Jack couldn't fuss over them enough.
sentences.cn: 希尔达姨妈和杰克姨父对他们宠爱有加。

sentences.en: Don't worry, Uncle Tim, your future is safe in our hands.
sentences.cn: 别担心，蒂姆大叔，你将来由我们照顾。

sentences.en: He began to talk about the Ukraine of his uncle's day.
sentences.cn: 他开始讲述他叔叔那个时代的乌克兰。

sentences.en: He tracked down his cousin and uncle. The latter was sick.
sentences.cn: 他追查到了堂弟和叔叔的下落，发现叔叔这时正在病中。

sentences.en: His uncle is dead, but his auntie still lives here.
sentences.cn: 他伯父已经过世，可他伯母还在这儿生活。

sentences.en: I knew how unbalanced Paula had been since my uncle Peter died.
sentences.cn: 我知道葆拉自从我叔叔彼得去世后情绪一直很不稳定。

sentences.en: I was very excited about becoming an uncle(= your sister or your brother’s wife has a child ).
sentences.cn: 要做舅舅了，我很激动。

sentences.en: I went to stay with my uncle and aunt for a few days.
sentences.cn: 我去和叔叔婶婶住了几天。

sentences.en: Lily spent years caring for her sick uncle.
sentences.cn: 莉莉照顾了她生病的叔叔好多年。

sentences.en: Members of the gang held him down until at last he cried uncle.
sentences.cn: 一帮盗贼强按住他直到最后他喊投降

sentences.en: My uncle was the mayor of Memphis.
sentences.cn: 我伯父是孟菲斯市市长。

sentences.en: She is expected to be subservient to her uncle.
sentences.cn: 她被要求对叔叔恭敬顺从。

sentences.en: Tim, may I introduce you to my uncle's secretary, Mary Waller?
sentences.cn: 蒂姆，我来介绍一下，这位是我叔叔的秘书玛丽·沃勒。

sentences.en: Uncle George quickly descended the ladder and nimbly stepped aboard.
sentences.cn: 乔治叔叔迅速爬下梯子，敏捷地上了船。

sentences.en: Uncle Herbert never argued, never spoke up for himself.
sentences.cn: 赫伯特叔叔从不与人争吵，也从不为自己辩护。

sentences.en: Uncle Philip
sentences.cn: 菲利普叔叔

sentences.en: Uncle Richard intoned a chapter from the Bible and improvised a prayer.
sentences.cn: 理查德叔叔吟诵了《圣经》中的一章，又即兴作了一段祈祷文。

sentences.en: Uncle, pa wants to see you.
sentences.cn: 舅舅，我爸爸想见你。

sentences.en: When she was orphaned,her uncle sent her to orphanage.
sentences.cn: 她的父母刚一去世，她的叔叔便把她送进了孤儿院。

words.tran_cn: 叔叔；伯父；伯伯；舅父；姨丈；姑父

phrases.phrase: cry (或 say 或 yell) uncle
cry uncle 或 say uncle 【非正式用语】
phrases.tran_cn: 投降：愿意放弃战斗或投降
[口]山姆大叔（美国政府的绰号）
汤姆叔叔；逆来顺受的美国黑人

phrases.phrase: Uncle Tom Cobley (或 Cobleigh) and all
phrases.tran_cn: (英，非正式)表示一长串人名单

trans.tran_cn: 叔叔，伯父，舅父，姑父，姨父
trans.tran_en: the brother of your mother or father, or the husband of your aunt
used by children, in front of a first name, to address or refer to a man who is a close friend of their parents
